credit_line: Gift of Tibor Kalman/ M & co.
dimensions: 10 x 10 x 10 cm (4 x 4 x 4 in.)
title: Paperweight Gift Box
description: Recto: The black coated cardboard box, designed to hold an M&Co gift paperweight (model unspecified), is imprinted on the front panel on the right, just off center, with unjustified left and right margins, in white italicized type: An object/ designed to hold/ down loose/ papers by its weight. On the back panel, just above the bottom edge, centered, are three lines of sans serif white type: Designed and Manufactured by M&Co/ 50 West 17, New York, NY 10011/ [copyright symbol] 1984 Patent Pending Made in U.S.A. Verso: blank white cardboard.
name: Box
